message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you a great deal on this product. I think it would be perfect for you! I'm willing to sell it for $120.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I was hoping to stay within my budget. Could you consider selling it for $95?
Hi Bob, I understand your budget concerns.  I can come down a bit, how about $110?
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I value your flexibility. Would you consider selling the product for $100?
